paras.content: Charter Technology Solutions provides technology consulting services to small/medium businesses, schools and libraries in the greater New York area. We are passionate about delivering cutting-edge solutions backed by the unwavering commitment to quality, efficiency and customer support. We do this by aligning ourselves with our clients as strategic business partners, allowing your organization to achieve greater operational efficiencies while keeping your costs low.

Charter Technology Solutions was founded by seasoned technologists with over 30 years of combined experience across multiple industry sectors. Our expertise spans from niche technologies to built-to-scale enterprise applications, but usually involves Microsoft and Apple products (servers and business applications), Networking projects (cabling, components deployment, security and wireless solutions) and also value add services such as VoIP telephony systems (cloud based).

If you know a friend, colleague or family member affiliated with an organization that has technology needs Charter Technology Solutions can fill, refer us. If your lead converts into a service agreement with the prospective client you referred, we will pay you a 10% referral commission towards the first month's dues.

It is our promise to you that we will engage in ways that serves your interests best. This means that we won't sacrifice quality to make a solution cost effective, and we will always follow industry best practices for technology implementations.
